MathExpression.Script: choose('Vehicle Acceleration Longitudinal' [G] < 0.5 AND ( 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] + 'Brake Pressure Rear' [bar] ) >= 10, abs('Vehicle Acceleration Longitudinal' [G] / ( 'Brake Pressure Front' [bar] + 'Brake Pressure Rear' [bar] )), invalid()) * 100

choose('Wheel Speed Front Left' [km/h] == 0 AND 'Motor Speed' [rpm] < 0 AND ( 'Wheel Speed Front Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Front Right' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [km/h] ) > 1, 1, 0)

choose('Wheel Speed Front Right' [km/h] == 0 AND 'Motor Speed' [rpm] < 0 AND ( 'Wheel Speed Front Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Front Right' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [km/h] ) > 1, 1, 0)

choose('Wheel Speed Rear Right' [km/h] == 0 AND 'Motor Speed' [rpm] < 0 AND ( 'Wheel Speed Front Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Front Right' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [km/h] ) > 1, 1, 0)

choose('Wheel Speed Rear Left' [km/h] == 0 AND 'Motor Speed' [rpm] > 0 AND ( 'Wheel Speed Front Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Front Right' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Left' [km/h] + 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [km/h] ) > 1, 1, 0)
Choose('Is Braking' == 1, 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] / ( 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] + 'Brake Pressure Rear' [psi] ), invalid())
choose(( 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] >= 5 OR 'Brake Pressure Rear' [psi] >= 5 ) AND 'Corr Speed' [km/h] >= 1, 1, invalid())
Choose('Is Braking' == 1, 2 * 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] / ( ( 2 * 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] ) + 'Brake Pressure Rear' [psi] ), invalid())
